abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column observes at Assn of National Advertisers conference, there was relief that worst had not happened, but worry about sluggish growth and continued high unemployment, both of which are discouraging consumers from buying products sold by group's big marketing members.
snippet: At the Association of National Advertisers’ conference, there was relief that the worst has not happened but worry about sluggish growth and high unemployment.
lead_paragraph: At the Association of National Advertisers’ conference, there was relief that the worst has not happened but worry about sluggish growth and high unemployment.

headline.main: Economy Casts Shadow on Advertisers’ Forum
headline.print_headline: Economy Casts Shadow on Advertisers’ Forum
headline.seo: Economy Casts Shadow on Advertisers’ Forum
